description: SpeechCustomClass is the Schema for the SpeechCustomClass API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: SpeechCustomClassSpec defines the desired state of SpeechCustomClass

annotations.description: Optional. Allows users to store small amounts of arbitrary data. Both the key and the value must be 63 characters or less each. At most 100 annotations.

displayName.description: Optional. User-settable, human-readable name for the CustomClass. Must be 63 characters or less.

projectRef.description: The Project that this resource belongs to.

external.description: The `projectID` field of a project, when not managed by Config Connector.

kind.description: The kind of the Project resource; optional but must be `Project` if provided.

resourceID.description: The SpeechCustomClass name. If not given, the metadata.name will be used.

status.description: SpeechCustomClassStatus defines the config connector machine state of SpeechCustomClass

conditions.description: Conditions represent the latest available observations of the object's current state.

lastTransitionTime.description: Last time the condition transitioned from one status to another.

message.description: Human-readable message indicating details about last transition.

reason.description: Unique, one-word, CamelCase reason for the condition's last transition.

status.description: Status is the status of the condition. Can be True, False, Unknown.

type.description: Type is the type of the condition.

externalRef.description: A unique specifier for the SpeechCustomClass resource in GCP.

observedGeneration.description: ObservedGeneration is the generation of the resource that was most recently observed by the Config Connector controller. If this is equal to metadata.generation, then that means that the current reported status reflects the most recent desired state of the resource.

observedState.description: ObservedState is the state of the resource as most recently observed in GCP.

deleteTime.description: Output only. The time at which this resource was requested for deletion.

etag.description: Output only. This checksum is computed by the server based on the value of other fields. This may be sent on update, undelete, and delete requests to ensure the client has an up-to-date value before proceeding.

expireTime.description: Output only. The time at which this resource will be purged.

kmsKeyName.description: Output only. The [KMS key name](https://cloud.google.com/kms/docs/resource-hierarchy#keys) with which the CustomClass is encrypted. The expected format is `projects/{project}/locations/{location}/keyRings/{key_ring}/cryptoKeys/{crypto_key}`.

kmsKeyVersionName.description: Output only. The [KMS key version name](https://cloud.google.com/kms/docs/resource-hierarchy#key_versions) with which the CustomClass is encrypted. The expected format is `projects/{project}/locations/{location}/keyRings/{key_ring}/cryptoKeys/{crypto_key}/cryptoKeyVersions/{crypto_key_version}`.

reconciling.description: Output only. Whether or not this CustomClass is in the process of being updated.

state.description: Output only. The CustomClass lifecycle state.

uid.description: Output only. System-assigned unique identifier for the CustomClass.

updateTime.description: Output only. The most recent time this resource was modified.
